data.message: Eminem, thank you for coming to Brazil this year 2016!!Me and my boyfriend are your fans and your music are already part of our history!! Even away from the stage, I could see you at Lollapalooza Brasil!!! And I cried a lot see you singing "I love the way you lie" which is one of the songs that marked my life!! I am a fan and i admire you!! I hope to see you in Brazil again!!! Thank you!!I love you <3
